lyric: 作词 : TetraCalyx
作曲 : 文驰Vinchi(HOYO-MiX)
编曲 : 文驰Vinchi(HOYO-MiX)
制作人 : 文驰Vinchi(HOYO-MiX)
Say my name when a tree susurrates
translation: 当花叶呢喃之时，请呼唤我的名字

lyric: Once and again telling a story lost in time
translation: 由此开启那飘零于时间里的故事

lyric: the way it starts and the way it ends
translation: 如是始源，如是终焉

lyric: Never again making up stories in dismay
translation: 不再自绝望中编织传说

lyric: With several starts, but just one end
translation: 分叉的起点，终将在结局交汇

lyric: Ah, how I long to embrace
translation: 啊，我多渴望拥抱

lyric: The future breaking out of shades from the past
translation: 那从往世荫蔽中破土的未来

lyric: Still ablaze
translation: 如炬如光

lyric: Save your tears for the day so far away
translation: 将眼泪留予遥远的那一天吧

lyric: To irrigate the wilderness that’s still asleep
translation: 让它润泽那尚在沉睡的荒野

lyric: In the world waiting to be lit
translation: 在那渴盼炬火的世界

lyric: To spread over the riverbeds so dry and dead
translation: 让它流经那干涸死寂的河床

lyric: Let ships that ran aground re-launch their sails
translation: 由此，搁浅之舟得以启航

lyric: Ah, how I long to embrace
translation: 啊，我多渴望拥抱

lyric: The future breaking out of shades from the past
translation: 那从往世荫蔽中破土的未来

lyric: Still ablaze
translation: 如炬如光

lyric: Seeds bear new life when flowers dare to fade
translation: 繁花谢世之时，万物自此新生

lyric: Petals linger about
translation: 飞花流连

lyric: awaiting one last dance
translation: 静待长别之舞

lyric: Shaking off all the dust from the past
translation: 将往世尘埃尽数抖落

lyric: New stories have yet to start
translation: 新的篇章行将开启

lyric: 电吉他 Electric Guitar：宫奇Gon(HOYO-MiX)
木吉他 Acoustic Guitar：李智谦 Zhiqian Li
人声录音Vocal Recording：徐威 Wei Xu@52HzStudio
混音师 Mixing Engineer：文驰Vinchi(HOYO-MiX)
母带制作 Mastering Engineer：文驰Vinchi(HOYO-MiX)
出品 Produced by：HOYO-MiX
